    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Bgm
    This class handles the background music for the game.
    Board
    This interface defines the operations for controlling bricks, managing the game state, and retrieving game information.
    Brick
    This interface defines a brick and its shape configurations.
    BrickGenerator
    This interface provides methods to get a new active brick for the game.
    BrickRotator
    This class handles the shape rotation of the active bricks.
    ClearRow
    This class represents the result of clearing the rows in the game matrix.
    DownData
    This class represents the result of a downward movement of a brick.
    EventSource
    Represents the source of an event in the game.
    EventType
    Represents the different types of user input events in the game.
    GameController
    Manages the user input and gameplay logic during the gameplay.
    GuiController
    This controller manages all graphical user interface (GUI) operations for the gameplay display in the Tetris-style game.
    HomeController
    This is the controller for the Home screen of the application.
    InputEventListener
    This interface handles the player input events and translates them into game actions.
    Level
    Tracks the player's level and handles level progression logic during the game.
    LinesCleared
    Tracks the total number of lines cleared by the player during a game.
    Main
    This class initialises and starts the game.
    MatrixOperations
    This class is used in manipulating the matrix operations.
    MoveEvent
    This class represents a movement event triggered either by the user or the system.
    NextShapeInfo
    This class represents the information about the next brick shape.
    NotificationPanel
    This class displays the bonus scores in the game.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Generates new bricks using 7-bag randomization system.
    SaveData
    The SaveData class manages reading and writing the game settings and player saved data to a text file.
    SaveDataType
    Represents the different types of data that can be saved and loaded in the game.
    Score
    Tracks the player's current score and handles automatic saving of high scores.
    SettingsController
    This is the controller for the Settings Screen of the application.
    Sfx
    This class handles loading and playing sound effects (SFX)
    SimpleBoard
    This class represents the game board.
    SoundData
    Represents an individual sound configuration consisting of a file name and volume.
    Timer
    Manages a countdown timer for timed game modes.
    ViewData
    This class represents all visual data required by the GUI to render the current game state.
